form.label: Worldwide Gun Ownership
form.description: Although the US has the highest gun owernship rates of any country in the world - by a large margin - it's homicide rate is 2.97 per 100k people. Compare this to Honduras, where 68.43 people are killed as a result of homicide per 100k yet 6.2 guns are owned per 100 people. Explore the data for yourself below.

search.query: | inputlookup world_firearms_murders_lookup.csv | search average_firearms_per_100_people="*" AND homicide_by_firearm_rate_100k="*" | stats values(average_firearms_per_100_people) AS "Ave. Guns Owned", values(homicide_by_firearm_rate_100k) AS "Ave. Homicide 100k" by country | rename country AS Country

choice.value: search average_total_all_civilian_firearms="*" | stats values(average_total_all_civilian_firearms) AS "Average total all civilian firearms" by country
search average_firearms_per_100_people="*" | stats values(average_firearms_per_100_people) AS "Average firearms per 100 people" by country
search number_of_homicides_by_firearm ="*" | stats values(number_of_homicides_by_firearm) AS "Number of homicides by firearm" by country
search homicide_by_firearm_rate_100k="*" | stats values(homicide_by_firearm_rate_100k) AS "Homicide by firearm rate per 100,000 pop" by country

input.choice: Homicide by firearm rate per 100,000 pop

choice.value: stats values(pc_of_homicides_by_firearm) AS "% of homicides by firearm" by country

input.default: search average_total_all_civilian_firearms="*" | stats values(average_total_all_civilian_firearms) AS "Average total all civilian firearms" by country
input.initialValue: search average_total_all_civilian_firearms="*" | stats values(average_total_all_civilian_firearms) AS "Average total all civilian firearms" by country

search.query: | inputlookup world_firearms_murders_lookup.csv | table rank_by_rate_of_ownership, country, average_total_all_civilian_firearms, average_firearms_per_100_people, homicide_by_firearm_rate_100k, number_of_homicides_by_firearm, pc_of_homicides_by_firearm, source | rename country AS Country, rank_by_rate_of_ownership AS "Rank by rate of ownership", average_total_all_civilian_firearms AS "Average total all civilian firearms", average_firearms_per_100_people AS "Average firearms per 100 people", homicide_by_firearm_rate_100k AS "Homicide by firearm rate per 100,000 pop", pc_of_homicides_by_firearm AS "% of homicides by firearm", number_of_homicides_by_firearm AS "Number of homicides by firearms", source AS Source
